grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 戻入【レイニュウ】reversal of monies, funds, commissions
背戻【ハイレイ】disobeying, infringing, running counter to
kun reading compounds: 戻す【もどす】to put back, to return, to give back, to restore (to a previous state, e.g. defrosting, reconstituting, reconciling), to turn back (e.g. clock hand), to vomit, to throw up, to recover (of a market price)
戻る【もどる】to turn back (e.g. half-way), to return, to go back, to recover (e.g. something lost), to be returned, to rebound, to spring back
